name: LoneSpace (LongBearded, eRedin, taniniwer, Sn4ke7)
description:
First person survival game. Lonely astronaut tries to find way back after accident on his ship. Try to keep mental health markers in good level, otherwise you'll go mad and die alone in cold and dark outer space.

Move:  W,A,S,D,Space
Interaction: Mouse, E

Game done in Unity Engine in 24 hour SpaceJam by Part-Time Kamikaze team.
